name: Blood of Heroes
text: You have a sense of destiny about you and always seem to succeed, even when the odds are against you.
benefit: Whenever you gain a level, you gain 2 hero points instead of 1.
normal: Whenever you gain a level, you gain 1 hero point.
text_zh: 即便天意弄人，你却一次又一次看清命运向成功前进。
benefit_zh: 当你升级时获得2英雄点。
normal_zh: 当你升级时获得1英雄点。
